p.dialogue: "Hello, it's nice to meet you. $h#$e#You picked a good time to move here... The spring is lovely."
"Don't tell anyone, but Willy let me steer the boat for a few minutes.$h"
"Well, that was deeply relaxing."
"I love the weather in Stardew Valley, but seeing a different climate now and then helps put things into perspective."
"The shape of the waves here is awe inspiring.#$e#I wonder if I could ever capture that sort of formlessness in a sculpture."
"I like the heat as long as I'm keeping perfectly still.$h"
"Mmm, I bet the trees around here would make for an interesting medium to work with.#$e#Though Willy probably wouldn't be happy with me if I dragged a bunch of logs onto his ship!$h"
"I wonder what kind of things you could forage out here.#$e#I think I saw some tasty looking walnuts growing on a bush nearby."
"Have you tried the Pi√±a Colada? I'm on my second one... hehe."
"I'll be honest. I don't want to dance with you.$u"
"I've realized I'm happier by myself. So just leave me be.$u"
"Ohh... Got it. Hah... I really don't have any luck when it comes to this stuff...$s"
"I don't want to see you for a while...$s"
"You caused a lot of grief with what you did... but I'm ready to put the past behind us.$s"
"I came for the sound of the ocean. Beautiful, isn't it?"

"The trees look nice today, don't they?#$q 21/22/211132 Mon_old#So why did you become a farmer?#$r 21 -5 Mon_21#I want to make tons of money.#$r 22 5 Mon_22#It's more \"real\" than living in the city.#$r 211132 5 Mon_211132#To follow in grandpa's footsteps.#$r 22 5 Mon_22#I wanted to escape my old life."
"$p 21#So are you making as much money as you hoped?|Spending time in nature is very rewarding."
"Hmm. That seems kind of shallow, doesn't it?$s"
"That's pretty much the reason I came here, too!$h"
"That's very sweet to honor your grandfather like that."

"Hi. Oh, you want to talk?#$e#The landscape around here gives me a lot of ideas. The terrain is almost like a sculpture itself.#$e#I don't make art for money. It's just an urge that I have.#$e#Farming seems like a very rewarding profession. You get to create delicious food for everyone!$h#$e#You're probably busy. Sorry."
"Hello, neighbor.#$e#We both live outside of town. Does that mean something?"
"#$1 LeahBug#This morning I accidentally stepped on a bug.$s#$e#Sometimes I think it's impossible to live without destroying nature in some way."
"I love being around animals. They're so innocent.#$e#Farm animals are wonderful, too.$h"
"Hi @! I was just thinking about you and your farm.#$e#I was imagining how good it must feel to harvest a big bunch of crops.$h#$e#Wouldn't it be nice to have help, though?$l"
"There's actually a lot of wild food in this area, if you know where to look.#$e#I've been having fresh salads almost every day.$h"
"Foraging is a specialty of mine. Someday I'll make you a fresh salad.$h"
"It's simpler to be friends with the trees. They don't have much to say.$h"
"We wouldn't be able to survive without nature. It's good to remember that."
"Hello, @. It's a nice day, isn't it?#$e#Stop by my cabin if you ever need someone to talk to.$h"
"I love to decorate for the different seasons."
"Farming sounds so fun. I want to try it, someday.$l"
"If you hear any banging from inside my hut, it's probably just me working on one of my sculptures."
"If you ever find any interesting looking driftwood, I could use it.#$e#It would be special that you gave it to me.$l"
"...What?$7#$b#Oh! Yeah, that's absolutely right!$h"

"There's nothing wrong with that... I think there's lots of beauty to be found in raw, untouched nature!#$b#But as a human, I'm also interested in how we shape and interpret the world around us... I guess what I'm saying is that I'm interested in 'art'."
"You pig!%fork$a^Oh! You're...? Me too.$6#$b#Get out!$a^That's good to know.$l"
"You're right... I just wouldn't have been happy back there.$u#$b#It was better for both of us... to end an unsustainable relationship while we were still young and flexible.$u"
"That's a little harsh... but, yeah. We had different priorities.$u"
"Oh yeah? Well maybe I'll just leave, then!%fork$a"
"*sigh*...$s#$b#I guess you're right... it was kind of selfish. But can you really blame me for wanting to be happy? Ugh... I don't know...$s"
"*sigh*...$s#$b#Maybe you're right... Humans are selfish creatures. I don't know. $s#$b#I probably shouldn't dwell on it. We all have to make hard choices from time to time.$s"
"You can tell it's summer by the sweet smell of nectar wafting through the air!$h"
"I found some wild fruits this morning!#$e#Sorry, I don't have any left.$s#$e#Keep looking, I'm sure you'll find something."
"The sound of farm animals is great, isn't it?"
"The simple things in life are best: a soft summer breeze, majestic clouds, and a goblet full of Stardew Valley red."
"I have a good eye for wild fruit. Some day I'll make you a nice fruit salad.$h"
"You can use a tapper to harvest syrups and other useful liquids directly from trees.#$e#It's a slow process, but the result can be quite valuable."
"I hate to be blunt, but if we don't treat nature with respect, our grandchildren will be doomed.#$e#Don't you think so?"
"Hello, @. Do you ever get lonely on that big farm?#$e#Stop by my cabin if you ever need someone to talk to.$h"
"The flowing water keeps my house a little bit cooler in summer.#$e#I can't tolerate heat very well."
"What should I do on such a warm, lazy day? *sigh*#$e#Any ideas?"
"How quickly the seasons change!#$e#It's shocking."

"#$c .5#I found some wild mushrooms over the weekend!#$e#I had a huge plate of wild mushrooms and eggs for breakfast today... I'm still full.#$e#Keep your nose to the ground and you'll find some mushrooms yourself... I'm sure of it."
"I wonder if I could make a collage out of dried leaves?#$e#They're just so colorful... I can't help but think of the potential for art projects.$h"
"Everyone has a unique and interesting perspective, whether they believe it or not. Don't you think so?#$e#Although, some people have opinions that I just can't respect."
"It's so nice to live by the river.#$e#I fall asleep to the soothing sound of water every night."
"One of these days I'll have to make you a wild mushroom stir-fry.$h"
"Do you have a kitchen in your house?#$e#If you have a kitchen, you can cook all kinds of delicious meals.$h"
"Stop by my cabin if you ever need someone to talk to.$h"
"Decorations accentuate the feeling of the season. I think it's a worthwhile tradition."
"There's a lot of good places to walk around here.#$e#It feels good to stretch your legs."
"I love the way everything looks when it's covered with fresh snow."
"It gets pretty cold in my little cabin.$s#$e#I just snuggle up under a huge blanket, and I'm okay.$h"
"I saw a snow rabbit early this morning! They're rare, aren't they?"
"I'm having a hard time finding fresh food to eat.#$e#I've been eating a lot of bread.$s"
"*Sigh*... It's hard to get fresh food in the winter.#$e#I bet your farm is pretty well stocked with food, huh?"
"Time seems to move slower here.#$e#When I lived in the city, the year went by so fast."
"Do you ever get cold in that farmhouse of yours?#$e#Stop by my cabin if you want to huddle under one of my quilts and drink cider.$h"
"Hello. Do you want something?"
"Hello, @. Is there something you wanted to talk about?"
"Do you ever take a whole day off?#$e#It's a refreshing break."
